messages.content: Hi, I have a co work always asking me questions about how to use her mobile. It is almost always the same questions.
It must be so frustrating to have to answer the same thing over and over. Is she older?
Yes, she is. She is telling that all the cell phone that she has been using have deleting her contacts.
My aunt does the same thing! I think what she is doing is accidentally deleting texts, and she doesn't understand how to check her contacts list. What do you think is happening with your co-worker?

evidence: I have a co work always asking me questions
What do you think is happening with your co-worker?
